modName: Follower Cynthia the Spell Lady and Elisif Replacer
summary: This mod add a standalone female mage follower, and replacer for "elisif the fair".
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center]
[i]Skyrim Special Edition Version [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/10764]here[/url]
[/i][/center][/size][center][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]Feel free to upload screenshots or videos[/font] : )
[/size]

[img width=760,height=427]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4251/34129319044_a5ddd365f5_o.png[/img]
[size=3]
[i][u]IMAGE INFORMATION[/u][/i][/size]
[size=2]Armor : Karlstein[/size][size=2] from "Black Desert Online"
BodyType : UUNP 7B Oppai[/size][b]
[/b][/center]


[center][size=3]Thanks [color=#f4f4f4][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHEdKzHeo5OiJhhiGG95wkA]DonProtein[/url][/color] and [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBRmzqswNKBPnUZW2df3DPw]Vatiwah[/url] for sharing videos ![/size][/center]
[center][youtube]U5eX2TQ42Lg[/youtube] [youtube]_lIBJsxO1Cw[/youtube][/center]


[size=3]-----[color=#9fc5e8]Changelog[/color]-----[/size]

2016/03/12    V1.0    CBBE version release.
[color=#ffd966][size=2]2016/03/13    V1.1    Fix glasses textures path miss.[/size][size=2] [/size][/color]
2016/03/13    V1.1    UNP version release.
[size=2]2016/04/25    V1.1a  [/size]Adjust chin width / length, and face width.[size=2]
[size=2]2016/04/25    V1.1a  New hairstyle released[/size][size=2][size=2].
[color=#ffd966]2016/05/01    V1.1b  [/color][color=#ffd966]Adjust chin width / face width[/color][size=2][color=#ffd966], fix eye_sk.dds texture path miss.
[size=2][size=2][size=2]2016/05/01    V1.1b[/size][/size][/size]  Elisif replacer released.[/color]
[/size][/size][/size][/size][size=2][size=2]2016/05/03    V1.1b  Add Cynthia as Elisif German translation by TKHBMVP. Remove CBBE V1.0 file.
[/size][/size][color=#ffd966]2017/05/30    V1.2    Face tweak and add hairstyles. Hairstyles archive support fomod.[/color]
                                [color=#ffd966]Change skeleton to XPMSE v3.94.
[/color][color=#ffd966]2017/05/30    V1.2a  Fix[size=2] hair[/size][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][color=#ffd966] texture path miss.[/color][/size][/size][/size][/size]
[/color]2017/06/10    V1.3    Update body textures to Fair Skin Complexion V9.2.
                                [color=#ffd966]Now UNP version body textures support UUNP.[/color]
                                Change sk.dds texture.
                                [color=#ffd966]Update Elisif Replacer to same with follower version. Hairstyles archive of Elisif Replacer support fomod.
[color=#ffffff]2017/07/07    V1.3    Upload darker eye cubemap file for ENB users.[/color]
[color=#ffd966][color=#ffffff]2017/09/25    V1.3    Reupload the Elisif replacer CBBE Version for Some users report 404 error when downloading the file.[/color][/color][/color]

[size=3]-----[color=#9fc5e8]ATTENTION[/color]-----[/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=3]PLEASE DO NOT REUPLOAD TO ANYWHERE BESIDES NEXUS , all files included are permitted by original author.[/size][/color]

[color=#e06666]Requires Skyrim version 1.9.32.0 or higher.[/color]

This mod add a standalone female follower named "Cynthia the Spell Lady",you can find her at "The Frozen Hearth" Inn in Winterhold.
Here are the main features:

[color=#ea9999]1.Seperation of the textures and the meshes[/color]
CBBE and UNP version are provided, feel free to exchange other CBBE/UNP variation by yourself.

Textures:
Including the body, the eyes, the eyebrow, and the teeth.
Skeleton:
Using XPMSE Ver3.94 (HDT), and you can exchange other skeleton you like.
Hair styles:
Using KS Hairdos Renewal hair, no need to install original hair mod.


[color=#ea9999]2.High definition(2K) texture[/color]
All body textures (exclude body and hand normalmap) is same as  the original version from "Fair Skin Complexion" by HHaleyy,
so you can go to the original mod page (see credits link) to download 4K version texture if you want best skin quality.


[color=#ea9999]3.Custom stats and combat style[/color]


[color=#ea9999]4.Essential & marriable[/color]


[size=3]-----[color=#9fc5e8]About Follower[/color]-----[/size]

[color=#b6d7a8]Name :[/color] Cynthia the Spell Lady
[color=#b6d7a8]Race :[/color] Nord
[color=#b6d7a8]Origin :[/color] unknown
[color=#b6d7a8]Age :[/color] unknown
[color=#b6d7a8]Height :[/color] about 170 cm (scale 1.00)
[color=#b6d7a8]Weight :[/color] unknown (npcweight 100)
[color=#b6d7a8]Initial level :[/color] 17 (auto level up)
[color=#b6d7a8]Max Level :[/color] 99
[color=#b6d7a8]Capable weapon :[/color] single-handed sword, stuff，combat with spell
[color=#b6d7a8]Proficient ability :[/color] Restoration(Expert), Destruction(Expert), Conjuration(Adept), Illusion(Adept), Light armor, sneaking, single-handed weapon
[color=#b6d7a8]Hobby :[/color] Practising ice spike on "weak spot" of human and creature body.
[color=#b6d7a8]Current location :[/color] "The Frozen Hearth" Inn in Winterhold[color=#b6d7a8][size=3]
[color=#b6d7a8][size=3]
***Spell List Comparison Table[/size][/color][color=#b6d7a8][size=3] for ESP Files[/size][/color]***
[/size][/color][img]http://i.imgur.com/iRfXZXD.png[/img]



[size=3][color=#b6d7a8][size=4][color=#f4f4f4][size=3][size=3][size=3]-----[/size][/size][color=#6fa8dc][color=#9fc5e8]Other Support Language[/color][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color][i][color=#b6d7a8][size=4][color=#f4f4f4][size=3][size=3]-----[/size]
[/size][/color][/size][/color][/i][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]
Simplified Chinese (by [color=#f1c232]msk207[/color])
[/size][/color][/size][size=3][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]German (by [color=#f1c232]TKHBMVP[/color])
Japanese by [url=http://skyrim.2game.info/detail.php?id=74168]Skyrim Mod データベース[/url] (有志翻訳に感謝)
Russian (by [color=#f1c232]Sergoramus[/color])[/size][/color][/size][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][color=#f4f4f4]
[i][size=3]See other German translations by TKHBMVP[/size][/i]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4827500/?tb=mods&pUp=1]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4827500/?tb=mods&pUp=1[/url]
[/color]

[size=3]-----[color=#9fc5e8]How to Install[/color]-----[/size]

[color=#e06666]Requires Skyrim version 1.9.32.0 or higher.[/color]

1. Save at SOMEWHERE ELSE besides The Frozen Hearth inn and leave the game.
2. Download this mod, and install it with mod manager (e.x NMM).
3. Start your mod manager, move Follower_Cynthia.esp to the order before your follower manager mod(e.x UFO, EFF, AFT).
4. Enter the game and go to The Frozen Hearth inn!


[size=3]-----[color=#9fc5e8]How to Uninstall[/color]-----[/size]

1.Bring Cynthia back to The Frozen Hearth inn.
2.Remove all her inventory and fare her well.
3.Move to somewhere else besides The Frozen Hearth inn.
4.Rest for 31 days (optional)
5.Save and leave the game.
6.Start your mod manager, disable Follower_Cynthia.esp, remove mod files by mod manager.


[size=3]-----[color=#9fc5e8]Q & A[/color]-----[/size]

[color=#b6d7a8]Q1. Can Cynthia's glasses be removed / enchanted?[/color]
A: Yes, the glasses is based on the excellent glasses mod "ImoMegane" by [b]hangakin[/b], it is a simply equipment item.
[color=#f4f4f4]    You can use the follower option to remove Cynthia's glasses then go to enchant it.

[color=#b6d7a8]Q2. Why Cynthia's glasses get purple color?
[color=#f4f4f4]A: Maybe you installed the CBBE V1.0 version. [/color][/color]
    Please update to V1.1 (Thanks for lunov's report).[/color]


[size=3]-----[color=#9fc5e8]Recommended Mods[/color]-----[/size]

Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524[/url]

FollowerLivePackage by oldcyder [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33002]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33002[/url]
UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLokii [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037[/url]


[center][/center][size=3][center][/center][/size][size=3][center][size=4]-----[color=#9fc5e8]Elisif Replacer[/color]-----[/size]

[img width=761,height=435]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4221/34368144814_f115f15d2d_o.png[/img][/center]
[/size][size=3]-----[color=#9fc5e8]How to Install[/color]-----[/size]

[color=#e06666]Requires Skyrim version 1.9.32.0 or higher.[/color][center][/center]
1. Save at SOMEWHERE ELSE besides Blue Palace and leave the game.
2. Download this mod, and install it with mod manager (e.x NMM).
3. Start your mod manager, move FollowerCynthia_asElisif.esp to the order after mods edit Blue Palace.
4. Enter the game and go to Blue Palace!


[size=3]-----[color=#9fc5e8]How to Uninstall[/color]-----[/size]

1. Save at SOMEWHERE ELSE besides Blue Palace and leave the game.
2. Start your mod manager, disable FollowerCynthia_asElisif.esp.
2. Uninstall this mod with mod manager (e.x NMM).


[size=3]-----[color=#9fc5e8]Q & A[/color]-----[/size]

[color=#b6d7a8]Q1. Well, does Elisif wear glasses this time?[/color]
A: No because she is Elisif XD
[color=#f4f4f4]

[color=#b6d7a8]Q2. Have any status change to Elisif?
[color=#ffffff]A: No, just change her face and add standalone meshes, textures, and skeleton to her.[/color]


[color=#ffffff][size=3]-----[color=#9fc5e8]Recommended Mods[/color]-----[/size][/color]
